name: SugarRoll Pte. Ltd.
description: Developer of a crypto sub-ledger and treasury reporting platform designed to simplify crypto asset management for Web3 natives. The company's platform offers real-time portfolio tracking, automatic transaction reconciliation and accounting support, enabling customers to manage their crypto assets across wallets and exchanges.
one_liner: Developer of a crypto sub-ledger and treasury reporting platform designed to simplify crypto asset management for Web3 natives. The company's platform offers real-time portfolio tracking, automatic transaction reconciliation and accounting support, enabling customers to manage their crypto assets across wallets and exchanges.
